title: Microsoft’s Cloud Business Is ‘Fuel in the Tank’ for Earnings
text:
Microsoft stock has charged ahead in 2019, and Wedbush thinks that the rally can continue, thanks to market-share gains for the company’s cloud product, Azure.

The back story. Microsoft stock (ticker: MSFT) is up nearly 37% year to date, compared with a 16.5% gain for the S&P 500 and a 30% rise for the Technology Select Sector SPDR ETF (XLK). The company is a favorite among analysts as it pushes into hardware, raises its dividend and scores well with environmentally and socially conscious investors.

...
description: Wedbush says market-share gains for Azure can help the stock to keep rallying.
